channel.title: Server coding help
channel.description:
Hey, I have a few questions that I hope you can help with.
1) I know this is probably a super noob question, but how do i change the max gold on my server.? (Complete) 2) Can some one post a guide/code for adding shops for pk points. I have pk points added into my server i just dont know how to add a shop for them. When i say a shop for pk points i meen a shop were u have to have Pk points to buy items. 3) How do i make is so when i run my client it closes out of the Cmd box, I'v seen this done on serveral clients but I have no idea how to do it. I have tryed copying the code from there run file, but it comes up with "Cannot fine pass specified." So if some one can help me with that it would be awesome. Thanks. :D

item.title: Server coding help
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

[quote=“Owner Saurus, post:3, topic:295851”]Try right clicking on the run pick edit, and where it says pause switch it to EXIT hope this helpped you :D[/quote] Hm, not working =\ got anything you else you need to change.? Like in the other files?

Read full topic

item.title: Server coding help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Saurus Owner Saurus
item.description:
@Owner_Saurus wrote:

Try right clicking on the run pick edit, and where it says pause switch it to EXIT hope this helpped you

Read full topic

item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

1- tutorials, google, search here etc
2-i forget what this was(as in your question)
3-copy and paste it just change your jdk version you copied to the one on ur cp.

item.title: Server coding help
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Hey, I have a few questions that I hope you can help with.

  1. I know this is probably a super noob question, but how do i change the max gold on my server.? (Complete)
  2. Can some one post a guide/code for adding shops for pk points. I have pk points added into my server i just dont know how to add a shop for them. When i say a shop for pk points i meen a shop were u have to have Pk points to buy items.
  3. How do i make is so when i run my client it closes out of the Cmd box, I’v seen this done on serveral clients but I have no idea how to do it. I have tryed copying the code from there run file, but it comes up with “Cannot fine pass specified.” So if some one can help me with that it would be awesome.
